songs.title: Wash Away
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics will be available upon release. Stay tuned!

[Verse 1]

[Chorus]
Open your mind
Wider than the ocean
Life is but a moment
And every single time you wanna give up
Hold on tight to what you love, and don't let go
And every single time you wanna break
Break from your troubles
Take a breath, every step
Let it wash away, wash away, ( oh, oh )
Oh, wash away

[Verse 2]
21 years ago, it's never ever been the same
And all my life I never wanted to play the game
I'm not the same as Michael even though the hall of fame
I'm all hall of faith
Put me on the wall of change
I got a couple things I learned along the way
Figured out how to mean what I say
I just gotta be me...

[Chorus]
Open your mind
Wider than the ocean
Life is but a moment
And every single time you wanna give up
Hold on tight to what you love, and don't let go
And every single time you wanna break
Break from your troubles
Take a breath, every step
Let it wash away, wash away, ( oh, oh )
Oh, wash away
